component.name: Clone Hero
component.summary: Clone Hero is a classic instrument based rhythm game for Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android

description.p: Clone Hero is a classic instrument based rhythm game for Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android. It's playable with any 5 or 6 fret guitar controller, any midi drum kit, any game controller and even your keyboard! Jam out with Drums, 5-fret Guitar, or 6-fret Guitar online or local!
